00002 #define FM_BI_GAIN_MGR3_HPP

00004 #include "FMBiGainMgr2.hpp"

00017 class FMBiGainMgr3 : public FMBiGainMgr2
00018 {
00019 public:
00021   FMBiGainMgr3(const FMParam& param) : FMBiGainMgr2(param) {}
00022 
00024   void updateNeighbor(unsigned int whichPart, 
00025                       unsigned int i_w, short deltaGain)
00026   {
00027     // Only free vertices are allowed to moved, therefore, only their
00028     // gains are updated.
00029     if (_cellList[i_w].isLocked()) return;
00030     // Vertices are inserted in FIFO manner.
00031     _gainBucket[whichPart].modifyKeyBy(_vertexArray[i_w], deltaGain);
00032   }
00033 };
00034 
00035 #endif
